name: justin cruser
text: I put in an order in on 9.29 for carryout. I did future pick up time of 11:30. When I got here doors are locked. No lights. I paid for my order online. I've been waiting for half an hour. I'm leaving.

name: Andrew McCurry
text: From my one visit, the calzone was delicious and really good. Takeout was pretty decent for a pizza.

name: David Polito
text: Accidentally ordered carry out instead of delivery one night and they called when I didn't show up. They delivered the pizza and even added a coupon. The service here is consistently excellent.

name: Roshera Banks
text: Great pizza. Seasoned well, hot from the oven, and a variety of toppings. Will go back.

name: Jeffery Champion
text: Good time and no problem parking during the day. Service was fast and friendly and the pizza was delicious as always

name: Kee Coe
text: Sheroes inc. hosted our second annual summit today. The managers that assisted with our order were Sean and Byron. We had a total 15 large pizzas. Great job will the presentment, helping loading the car, and maintaining a positive attitude through it all. This store rocks!!!!

name: travis Kennard
text: Been coming here for years. The service has steadily gone downhill through its relocations and the pizza quality is subpar at times. I ordered the pepperoni Supreme and it was so greasy it soaked through the box.

name: Jennifer Sumner
text: Love the atmosphere,  the team members  are extremely friendly and wonderful, the Manager Byron is awesome! Love the food.

name: Michael Morrison
text: I ordered from here A LOT. I got hair on my pizza and they gave me the run around for a week about getting my money back. I once cancelled an order and the poor driver still came with the order.... this company lacks the communication it â€¦More

name: 2B Excat
text:
We had a really nice time,
Had some ppl, meet me up there, Pizza was really hot, and good along w/ the breadsticks we ordered the salad, it was also good, (We ordered the large one). â€¦More

name: Lamarr Burroughs
text: Fantastic pizza. I had bbq and chicken. I fell in love with every bite and so will you

name: Melanie Graves
text: The food was great....also good serviceðŸ˜Š

name: Hope Jones
text: I used to go their all the time, the food is really good and the crust is perfect(if your a crust eater) and if your love meat obviously you should try the meat lovers very tastey!

name: Adrian Perez
text: This is the second time this happens! I ordered 4 cheese cups knowing they would charge me for the 2 extra cups which I was fine with, but it's just upsetting how I come to find nothing inside my cheesy bread sticks box.!! My child is a fan of the cheesy bread sticks with cheese dip, and now his  night was ruined. Thanks a lot :(

name: James Murray
text: Delivery from this store is confirmed as terrible. We've given them multiple chances and they've either been quite late or messed up the order. Tonight we ordered at 9:32PM and the online ordering system estimated 10:06PM delivery. We â€¦More

name: bpolito530
text: Marcos pizza is my new favorite pizza! Wanted to try something new then my norm of Donatos or Pizza Hut and they were worth the switch!

name: Cecila Mccowan
text: Good pizza and cheap

name: Casiquire Ziphonium
text: I've had very few issues with this branch of Marco's pizza.  Their ratio of good experiences to bad is quite a bit higher than the other pizza chains nearby, and there are many.  Once there was a technical glitch from their order placing â€¦More

name: Matt Jewell
text: Always good always on time or early. Side note, one of their drivers is one of the most beautiful women I've ever seen.

name: Dan Branstrator
text: Tried to get delivery at 9:45pm. Guy on the phone told me they're not doing deliveries. They don't close until 11pm. Think I was lied to.  Too bad... I normally love this place.

name: Stephen Milby
text: Wonderful crew. Great pizza!

name: Kevin Law
text: bad delivery. ordered wings, forgot ranch. over an hour later they brought my ranch. horrible experience compared to other locations. boo.

name: Roger Payne
text: Had no sauces for bread sticks,did not offer any, my order was complete and laying on the counter getting cold and I was sitting there

name: Matthew Hedinger
text: Decent pizza great cheesy bread

name: Regina Long
text: Want good pizza go here

name: Zachary Huggins
text: Had their thin crust pepperoni and bacon for the first time I must say will definitely have to order that again

name: Charles King
text: Great

name: Nova Caesar
text: Always closes like a half hour early. At least fix your website or stick to your hours.

name: Oliver Watts
text: Tasty

name: Archie Johnson
text: Great food and pizza

name: S
text: Good pizzas

name: Karen M
text: HORRIBLE delivery service!

name: Mauricio Rodriguez
text:
(Translated by Google) Rich pizza

(Original)
Rica pizza
